title: Katatonia - BINAURAL SURROUND discography (2006-2016)
description: These albums are surround to binaural stereo downmixes produced from official surround mixes using head-related transfer functions (HRTFs). When played over any headphones, they recreate the impression of spatial (3D) positioning of surround speakers around the listener. The strength of this effect varies from song to song and from album to album, depending on how the surround format was utilized by the producer of each surround mix. The raw output from the HRTFs was also tweaked to remove some distracting artefacts introduced by the processing, and to ensure the music remained pleasant to listen to. In most cases, these binaural mixes have a much higher dynamic range than the official stereo mixes, meaning they have a much more open (as opposed to compressed) sound. The script used to produce these files can be found here: https://github.com/bucaneer/binauralconv Further reading and resources: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Head-related_transfer_function http://www.sofaconventions.org/mediawiki/index.php/Main_Page https://ffmpeg.org/ffmpeg-filters.html#headphone ======================================================================== All files FLAC, stereo, 24bit, 48kHz. [2006] The Great Cold Distance Based on 5.1 mix from 2007 DVD-A release by Jens Bogren [2012] Dead End Kings Based on 5.1 mix from 2012 DVD-A release by Jens Bogren [2016] The Fall of Hearts Based on 5.1 mix from 2016 DVD-V release by Bruce Soord
